title: Heineken
description: 5% full-bodied premium lager with deep golden colour, a mild bitter taste and a balanced hop aroma leaving a crisp, clean finish for ultimate refreshment

title: Kronenbourg
description: Premium Beer. https://www.k1664.co.uk/nutrition/. Brewed with the unique strisselspalt aroma hops from Alsace

title: Cobra
description: Beer. Cobra Foundation Founded in 2005 providing support for communities in South Asia. Cobra Premium 4.5% Lager

title: Brewdog Punk IPA
description: Bursts of caramel and tropical fruit with an all-out riot of grapefruit, pineapple and lychee, precede a spiky bitter finish.
